entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023
